preqs: Students must have completed 48 credit points, including PGC5101 (PGC5001) and PGW5205 (PGW5127)

rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course version {2985, P6003}
(Must have passed 48 (I/W) credit points AND  Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {PGC5001, PGC5101, PGW5127, PGW5205})

unitName: Advanced clinical practice in wound care
description: This unit will explore issues surrounding the development of advanced practice in wound care including ethics, evidence based practice, critical thinking and critical reasoning, reflective practice, cost-effectiveness, patient-centred practice and the development of expertise and leadership.
faculty: Faculty of Pharmacy and Pharmaceutical Sciences
